inverse.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if there is an inverse relationship between two amounts, one gets bigger at the same rate as the other gets smaller
inverse.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Clearly, the amount of money people save increases in inverse proportion to the amount they spend.
the inverse relationship between prices and interest rates
inverse.translation[2].definitions[0].de: used for saying that one thing increases at the same rate as another related thing gets smaller
inverse.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Stocks moved in inverse relation to oil prices throughout the day.
